column5: Purchased a barely used Stella of the net for a great price, the reel is in IMACULATE shape, now I am wondering what i should match it up with. It's a 2500ar , does anyone have any experience with the new Loomis NRX's? I want it to be my light jigging-plastics rod running 4-8 pound line on it. Any suggestions?   Darren
Nrx r nice rods. But to be honest, didn't wow me.
You could always match it up with me.
Put it in a glass case with an alarm.
buy the GLX 4-8 in the classifieds from Spiel if i didnt already have that rod i would have that one with me i love that rod
Strap it to a 6'9" med lite legend extreme or 6'8" med extra fast and grin ear to ear each time you set the hook...
7' ugly stik.  that rod makes every good combo a great combo
NRX rods are very nice and with a stella it with be a WOW I love this lol
I was confused why you didn't want to drink your stella....
The only rod good enough for that is a Spiel rod, otherwise I agree with DanC
I have that same Stella and have it paired with a Loomis GLX medium.  Great combo!
Use it for a lithger setup like your thinking. 8lb fluoro or light braid would be sick with that reel.  Nice reel, share a pic of the setup when you choose a rod, can't beat a high end St Croix
BPS Carbon-lite, very sensitive and light.  I had my stella on it for a while and it was a great combo.
